results.abstract: NASA aide A J Mayer Jr patents parachute system for returning orbiting astronauts to earth; illus

headline.main: Patent Is Awarded for Space Chute; New System to Get Its First Test in May Orbiting VARIETY OF IDEAS IN NEW PATENTS Stretch for Children Stapler for Wounds

results.snippet: WASHINGTON, March 1--An invention of great importance to the astronaut--the parachute that brings his Mercury capsule safely back to earth--was patented this week. It will be used in May on America's fourth orbital flight.

byline.original: By STACY V. JONES Special to The New York TimesNASA

results.lead_paragraph: WASHINGTON, March 1--An invention of great importance to the astronaut--the parachute that brings his Mercury capsule safely back to earth--was patented this week. It will be used in May on America's fourth orbital flight.

headline.main: Music: Menotti Opera; 'Labyrinth' on TV Is Not His Best The Cast

results.snippet: NEW YORK. The interior of a space  ship. Weightlessness. The protagonist and the astronaut meet. But a meteor demolishes craft and men. Dissolve. He is in a railroad car half full of water.

headline.main: Sidelights; Short Sales Stop in Molybdenum Mutual Funds Lag Waiting for Merger Wrench for Use in Space

results.snippet: NEW YORK. One of the highlights of  Tuesday's activity on the American Stock Exchange was heavy trading in the stock purchase warrants of the Molybdenum Corporation of America.

results.abstract: Sec of State for War J Profumo tells Commons he had no part in disappearance of 21-yr-old model C Keeler, who failed to appear as witness in shooting case; denies impropriety in his acquaintanceship with girl; illus

headline.main: British War Secretary Denies Part in Disappearance of Girl; British War Minister Makes Statement to Commons on Missing Witness

results.snippet: LONDON, March 22--John Profumo, Secretary for War, told the House of Commons today that he had had no part in the disappearance of a girl involved in a recent court case here.

byline.original: By SYDNEY GRUSON Special to The New York Times

results.lead_paragraph: LONDON, March 22--John Profumo, Secretary for War, told the House of Commons today that he had had no part in the disappearance of a girl involved in a recent court case here.

results.abstract: Fairchild Camera tests aluminum skull filled with electronic devices, part of dummy being developed to give data on effects of space conditions; Gen Dynamics tests device to measure deterioration of astronauts skill under flight stress; illus

headline.main: DEVICES STUDY SPACE EFFECTS; Instruments Measure Astronauts' Skills in Space

results.snippet: Scientists at opposite ends of the nation have developed two new devices to help measure the effects of space flight on United States astronauts.

byline.original: Special to The New York Times. NEW YORK

results.lead_paragraph: Scientists at opposite ends of the nation have developed two new devices to help measure the effects of space flight on United States astronauts.
